abstract_ssm: The J.A.R. Elliott Company records span the period 1900 to 1952 and mostly concern the manufacture and sale of the Elliott Perfect Ear Protector from the years 1903 to 1930. Additional records include Ear Protector testimonials, publicity materials, layouts, clippings, advertisements, ledgers, ephemera, bills, and a scrapbook containing correspondence and documents for foreign patents. The collection also contains Elliott's correspondence from the years 1902 to 1913 concerning his shooting career.
